column2: Below you can browse all content of your site and recommend some of them for your members. So admin(you) recommendations will have higher priority which allows you to promote wished content(blog, event, group, page, etc). Please note that admin recommendations are always shown in the widgets so accurately choose the number of recommended items to avoid showing the same content permanently.
